recipe.cookingMethod: 1. Preheat the oven to 500°F. 2. Roll out the pizza dough on a floured surface. 3. Spread the tomato sauce over the dough. 4. Add slices of fresh mozzarella cheese.

1. Cut the chicken into thin strips. 2. Cut the bell peppers and onion into thin slices. 3. Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat. 4. Add the chicken and cook for 3-4 minutes per side, until browned.
1. Cut the beef into thin strips. 2. Slice the onion and mushrooms. 3. Cook the egg noodles according to package instructions. 4. Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat.
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F. 2. Mash the bananas in a bowl. 3. Add the flour, sugar, eggs, and baking soda to the bowl. 4. Mix until well combined.
